alert.note: Alert for Griggs; Steele (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 28 at 8:21PM CDT until June 28 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR EASTERN GRIGGS AND WEST CENTRAL STEELE COUNTIES... At 820 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cooperstown, or 35 miles north of Valley City, moving southeast at 25 mph. At 800 PM CDT, the public reported quarter size hail near Binford. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cooperstown, Hannaford and Jessie. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
